name: getLocaleDisplayName
description: Gets a locale value and displays the name in a manner that is appropriate to a specific locale. By default, gets the current locale in the current locale's language.

params.name: locale
params.description: The locale whose name you want. The default is the current ColdFusion locale, or if no ColdFusion locale has been set, the JVM locale.

params.name: inLocale
params.description: The locale in which to return the name. The default is the current ColdFusion locale, or if no ColdFusion locale has been set, the JVM locale.

lucee.notes: Lucee5+ Deprecated in favor of getLocaleInfo()

examples.title: Output current Locale's display name than set it to swiss locale
